Text:
This is the corrected version of Final_Fantasy_XIII-2_ASiA_MULITi2_PS3-NRP that was uploaded earlier. I have no idea what took the release group a month to issue a fixed version.

As before, the file size of the game is huge. Please be patient.

is this one going to work.
you really let me down last time

@aceman2010:
You are aware of the "Uploader's Note" I wrote in the previous FF13-2 upload, right?

In case it was too subtle...

At the time of this upload (2012-03-15), there is no known way to play this. You can download the game now and hold onto it until such a method is available. Or you can just pass on downloading this.

Hope that clears up any misunderstandings.
